author: Paulet Corrigan
reviewBody: ‚ùå Not Verified |  Courteous and friendly staff. Flight left early by about 10-15 minutes, when it was confirmed all planning to fly were on board. Crew was great. Seating was great.

header: Long Island Macarthur Airport customer review
author: John Clift
reviewBody: Islip to Baltimore with SWA. A hidden gem in the NY area for local flights terminal is clean and spacious with good facilities all round. A much better option than the scrum at JFK or LGA particularly if you are out of the city and have a rental car.

header: Long Island Macarthur Airport customer review
author: C Griffen
reviewBody: ISP is an excellent alternative to LGA JFK or Newark! I've flown out and in to there at least 10 times and I have never been delayed! The makeover they gave the airport is great too! It would be nice to see ISP expand a little bit with some more airlines going out of there.
